Bitcoin Monitor visualizes crypto prices across exchanges, allowing you to spot the cheapest price for the cryptocurrency you're looking for. If you're into trading, then use our purely AI driven trade signals which provide you with up-to-date trade recommendations. You can use these recommendations to support your buy, sell or HODL decisions.

- Simultaneous price comparison of multiple exchanges like Kraken, Binance, Coinbase, Coinbase Pro, Poloniex, OKEX, HitBTC, Bitpanda, Bitfinex, Bitstamp & Coinfinity
- Trade Signals: Strong Sell, Sell, Neutral, Buy, Strong Buy

- Quickly spot the cheapest & most expensive price
- Change History & Volatility Monitor with insight into trends and volatility of the crypto markets
- Arbitrage calculation: Difference between lowest purchase price and best selling price -> theoretically possible profit in high-frequency trading
- Real-time quotes for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, IOTA, EOS, Stellar, DASH & other cryptocurrencies
- Benchmarking between FIAT currencies (€, $, £) and Altcoins (ETH, BCH, LTC, XRP, IOTA, EOS, XLM, DASH)

Bitcoin Monitor supports the following cryptocurrencies and markets:

Bitcoin (BTC):
- BTC / EUR
- BTC / USD
- BTC / GBP

Ethereum (ETH):

- ETH / USD
- ETH / BTC

Switching between markets helps you get a broader insight into the market situation. You can also compare the performance of Bitcoin in different currencies (Euro, Dollar, Sterling) and even measure Bitcoin against Altcoins like Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Ripple, IOTA, XLM, EOS & DASH.

- Change & Volatility Monitor:
The Change & Volatility Monitor describes the direction and magnitude of price fluctuations. If Bitcoin performed positively within the given time span, it is colored in green. Otherwise it is colored in red. Further intervals allow you to examine the price action more closely. The displayed price for an interval is the average price of all exchanges for that moment. Its relative change compared to the price 24 hours ago gives you an understanding of the trend and volatility of the market.

- Cross Coin Check
Our Cross Coin Check gives you a broad insight into market developments and allows you to compare Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Litecoin (LTC) and IOTA (MIOTA) among each other. For this purpose, we continuously calculate all the prices and calculate the relation to each other. It is important for us to emphasize that the prices are obtained directly and unaltered by the exchanges! That means, our exchange rates are not manipulated (yes, we're hinting at 'Coinmarketcap').

- Trade Signals
Our purely AI driven trade signals provide you with up-to-date trade recommendations. You can use these recommendations (strong sell, sell, neutral, buy, strong buy) to support your buy, sell or HODL decisions.

The current prices for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Ripple, Litecoin, XLM, EOS, DASH and IOTA are obtained directly from the exchanges and are not altered like on Coinmarketcap. This means that you get live tickers from exchanges like Kraken, Binance, Coinbase, Coinbase Pro, Poloniex, OKEX, HitBTC, Bitpanda, Bitfinex, Bitstamp and Coinfinity.

With our free crypto apps you're well equipped to make the right buying or selling decision of Bitcoin and Altcoins!

Muun is the most powerful wallet for bitcoin and lightning network. It is simple, fast, and secure. We provide the best user experience for sending and receiving bitcoin (BTC). 

Muun's highlights include:

- Lightning fast payments: send and receive instant payments using bitcoin's latest tech, lightning network. Lightning is the most popular scaling solution for blockchains and brings great UX benefits such as faster and cheaper payments.

- Seamless lightning integration: make all payments from a single wallet and following the same steps. You can enjoy lightning without needing any specific knowledge.

- Smartest bitcoin fees: Muun's mempool-based estimator gets your transaction confirmed fast without overpaying. Save an average of 30% compared to other wallets.

- Fully self-custodial: Muun is a self-custodial wallet meaning you are in total control of your bitcoin. Nobody, not even Muun, can access your money. Export an Emergency Kit with your private keys and output descriptors, intended to be used in a scenario where Muun is unavailable. The Kit was designed to fit bitcoin's latest scripts, including multisig, lightning and taproot.

- Convenient wallet recovery: access your wallet from a different phone using a code written on paper or your email and password.

- Protected with multi-signature: Muun is a 2-of-2 multi-signature wallet. Your Emergency Kit has both keys, but your phone just one. Your money is safe even if your phone gets hacked or stolen because two keys are needed to spend it, and only one is in your phone.


Other features include:

- Fee selection
- Support for Bech32
- Native app
- Customer support in English and Spanish

For feedback and assistance, you can reach us at support@muun.com.
